title: Add printable sell bill with company header and transaction details

requirements.text: Generate a printable sell bill when saving a product sale that includes farmer name, product name, price per unit, quantity, total amount, date and time, and company header ('ANMOL DAIRY LIFE')

quotes: Allow to print sell bill while saving
bill contain farmer name , product name , price, quantity, amount, date and time company header

acceptanceCriteria: Sell bill displays company header 'ANMOL DAIRY LIFE' at the top
Bill includes farmer name (when a farmer is selected for the sale)
Bill shows product name, price per unit, quantity, and calculated total amount
Bill displays the current date and time of the transaction
Print dialog opens automatically after saving a product sale
Bill format is clean and suitable for printing on standard paper

requirements.text: In SellModule.tsx, trigger the print dialog immediately after successfully saving a product sale to the backend

quotes: Allow to print sell bill while saving

acceptanceCriteria: Print dialog appears automatically after the sale is saved
User can proceed with printing or cancel the dialog
The print action does not interfere with the form reset or success feedback

requirements.text: Create a reusable utility function similar to pdfGenerator.ts that generates HTML content for the sell bill with proper styling for print media
acceptanceCriteria: Utility function accepts sale details (farmer, product, price, quantity, amount, timestamp) as parameters
Generated HTML includes print-specific CSS styles
Bill layout is optimized for A4 or letter-size paper
Function is located in frontend/src/utils/ directory

constraints: Do not modify backend schema or main.mo
Use browser's native print dialog (window.print()) rather than external PDF libraries
Follow existing print styling patterns from index.css (@media print rules)
Maintain the existing SellModule.tsx form flow and validation
nonGoals: Email or SMS delivery of the sell bill
PDF file download functionality for sell bills
Batch printing of multiple sell bills
Custom print layout settings or configuration
